nl.inl.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for working with files

        Parameters:

      • processTree

        public static void processTree(java.io.File root,
               FileUtil.FileTask task)
        Perform an operation on all files in a tree
        Parameters:
        root - the directory to start in (all subdirs are processed)
        task - the task to execute for every file

      • processTree

        public void processTree(java.io.File dir,
               java.lang.String glob,
               boolean recurseSubdirs,
               FileUtil.FileTask task)
        Perform an operation on some files in a tree
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory to start in
        glob - which files to process (e.g. "*.xml")
        recurseSubdirs - whether or not to process subdirectories
        task - the task to execute for every file

      • globToRegex

        public static java.lang.String globToRegex(java.lang.String glob)
        Convert a simple file glob expression (containing * and/or ?) to a regular expression. Example: "log*.txt" becomes "^log.\*\.txt$"
        Parameters:
        glob - the file glob expression
        Returns:
        the regular expression
